remarks: A vector (translation) belongs to the 1-dim subspace it generates. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dia1dimid.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia1dimid.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia1dimid.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia1dimid.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia1dimid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> F e. ( I ` ( R ` F ) ) ) $.
